definitions.text: the act of choosing or selecting
examples: your choice of colors was unfortunate

definitions.text: an assortment of things from which a choice can be made
examples: the store carried a large selection of shoes

definitions.text: the person or thing chosen or selected
examples: he was my pick for mayor

definitions.text: a natural process resulting in the evolution of organisms best adapted to the environment
a passage selected from a larger work
examples: he presented excerpts from William James' philosophical writings
